# Star Multiventure Pvt. Ltd. - LLM Information

## Company Overview
Star Multiventure Pvt. Ltd. is India's leading manufacturer of premium aquaculture equipment, specializing in HDPE fish farming cages, floating jetties, and aqua tourism solutions.

## Core Products
- HDPE Fish Farming Cages (Rectangle and Circular)
- Floating Jetties and Pontoon Systems
- Aquaculture Equipment and Accessories
- Custom Floating Platforms for Tourism

## Service Areas
We serve aquaculture farms and water tourism projects across all states of India, with particular expertise in:
- Fish cage culture installations
- Floating dock systems
- Aqua tourism platform development
- Marine and freshwater aquaculture solutions

## Company Values
- Premium quality HDPE construction
- 5-year manufacturing warranty
- 24/7 customer support
- Sustainable aquaculture practices
- Expert technical guidance

## Contact Information
Website: https://www.starsupplierss.com
Industry: Aquaculture Equipment Manufacturing
Established: 2016
Headquarters: India

## Key Specialties
- Cage culture technology
- HDPE floating solutions
- Aquaculture consulting
- Custom marine installations
- Fish farming equipment supply

## Target Keywords
aquaculture equipment, fish farming cages, HDPE floating jetties, cage culture India, floating pontoons, aqua tourism solutions, fish cage manufacturers, marine aquaculture systems
